title: Instructional Design Based on the Community of Inquiry (COI) Model to Improve the Effectiveness of Online Employee Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and language education experience
context.additional_context: A language education course conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, structured as a blended learning environment integrating teaching, social, and cognitive presence

learning_goals: Learners concretely explain online learning module design plans by utilizing the three presences (teaching, social, cognitive) of the Community of Inquiry (COI) model.
Learners develop two or more effective online teaching strategies for smartphone-based environments and present application cases.
Learners complete and present a blended learning curriculum design aligned with language education objectives through project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
